overview: Asia Carrera brings her love of life and incredible musical talents to the screen like never before as she celebrates a bygone era. Living in the modern world can never match the arousing fantasies she has of carnal bliss in Mozart's time. Even though she's trapped in today's world, her nasty mind wanders the dusty, sensual halls of the past. How truly wonderful it would be to stay there forever! But alas, that's impossible. Isn't it?
title: Appassionata
